overview_of_class: This course provides an introduction to the six leadership assets that are foundational to the program: asking powerful questions, inspiring others through narrative, mobilizing people, thriving in collaborative and hierarchical settings, navigating through change and resilience. Components of the course include weekly lectures, guest speakers and discussion groups.
name: Paradigms and Strategies of Leadership
title: MEAS LDRSHP 204-0-20 Paradigms and Strategies of Leadership

descriptions.name: Overview of class

Components of the course include weekly lectures, guest speakers and discussion groups.
